item.description:
Hi everyone!!

The summer is almost over, and we are ready to meet with you again for new interesting discussions, classes and movie-nights for boosting your mood, energy and health.

We would be delighted if you considered coming to them and finding something useful for yourself to live a holistic lifestyle!

See you soon!

Angela

 

Therapeutic Qi-Gong classes     are going to resume at the Eternal Balance studio in September!
These classes are a wonderful and healing practice for people who suffer from depressions, anxiety, and/or for those under a stress.

It's a great addition to your daily health routine, or any therapy sessions.

After the first class, you'll notice the difference in your body and mind - for the better.

It will be very helpful in improving balance, flexibility, strength and mental clarity. 

If you suffer from any pain, disease, fatigue, or the effects of aging, and are looking for gentle exercises, this class just may be the answer you’ve been searching for.

Come and check it out.

------------------------------------------

For those who are hearing the word "Qi-gong" for the first time, here is a little more information:
 

Qi-Gong is a traditional energy exercise practiced for many centuries by the Chinese for health, healing, recovery from injury, and disease prevention.

It is the practice of body and mind and is the basis for deeper trainings like Thai- Chi (Taiji) and Martial Arts.
There are hundreds of forms of Qi-Gong. In this class you will be introduced to Therapeutic Qi-Gong.
It was developed by Chinese doctors who were practicing Traditional Chinese medicine, and widely recommended this form of Qi-Gong to their patients for faster healing or as an addition to Western medicine.

Qi-Gong  combines physical exercises in slow, graceful movements, gentle stretching, breathing, and self-massage.

There are also a couple of static Qi-Gong forms included in this class. They are similar to meditations, but directed towards building strength and inner power while in a relaxed state.

It is for everybody of any age!
The more you practice the more you feel the benefits!

50-min. classes at 12 pm, Wednesdays and Fridays
starting Wednesday, September 21, 2011.
Price:
$15.00 - Drop-in or trial class. 5 classes - $50 
Small group classes. 5 people limit. Register early!
Please RSVP to try a class, and pay at the door.

item.name: Therapeutic Qi-Gong for beginners. Simple. Gracious. Healing.
